sentences.sContent: His love of conversation, his affection, his indifference to riches, even his garrulity, are interesting traits of character.
sentences.sContent_eng: His love of conversation, his affection, his indifference to riches, even his garrulity, are interesting traits of character.
sentences.sCn: 他热爱恳谈，他的友爱倾向，他对富人的冷淡，还有他的多嘴饶舌，使他成为性格鲜明的风趣人物。

remMethod.val: 来自garrulous(adj. 唠叨的， 饶舌的)

words.tran: 唠叨的；喋喋不休的；多嘴的
多嘴多舌；喋喋不休；多话；唠叨（原形是garrulous）
